TopicTitle: KSP title screen - so who lost his helmet?

Articles.Content:
...so who took off the helmet to lick a rock and then dropped it because it was hard to breathe on the Mun?

(If you don\'t know what I\'m talking about, watch the 'Mun surface' KSP title screen for a while)

It was Bill. That dude is always jacking things up

8) Jeb

:\'( Bob

??? Bill
